pageContent: Purpose: To determine whether the forecasted assessment of how someone would feel in a future health state can be predictive of utilities (e.g. as elicited by the time-trade-off method) and also predictive of optimal decisions as determined by a decision-analytic model.

metaData.source:
Hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism in type 2 diabetes, obesity and the metabolic syndrome
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19075678/
